snippet.title: WONDER WARS TRAILER
snippet.description:
DOWNLOAD WONDER WARS NOW! Click on this link: bit.ly/WonderWarsYT or search "Wonder Wars" on Google Play and App Store. 

Join Wonder Wars and start collecting all the characters to create the best team and lead the rankings!

More than 40 characters, including HEROES and TROOPS with awesome skills, are waiting for you in Mundo Maravilla! Show your friends who is the best!

- Find the best synergies and create up to three teams to conquer the leaderboards in PVP or the Dark Tower and Dungeons in PVE!
- Choose your hero and six troops and defeat your enemies!
- Customize your profile card and let the world know all you got!
- Unlock all the arenas and challenge your friends to prove you are the best!

Wonder Wars features:

- Unlock HEROES and TROOPS with unique skills to build the perfect team.
- Create the best compositions that adapt to your playstyle: aggro, defensive, strategic...
- Try your teams in PVE modes, such as Training Mode, Dark Tower and Dungeons.
- Go PVP and get all the trophies you can to lead the ranking. There are nine leagues in Wonder Wars, can you be a Legend of Mundo Maravilla?
- Open chests to unlock new characters, level them up, and get resources such as coins and gems.
- Collect skins for your heroes, arenas and pedestals. You'll look great with them!
- Level up troops and change their appearance and get more HP for your heroes in battles.
- Enter the Dark Tower mode with your team and try to reach the highest floor you can!
- Try Dungeons and complete the challenge to receive more resources!
- Add your friends and challenge them to try new teams or prove who is better!

Are you ready? Join Wonder Wars NOW! bit.ly/WonderWarsYT

---------------

⬇⬇ DON'T MISS ANYTHING ⬇⬇
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wonderwarsgame
Instagram: https://instagram.com/wonderwarsgame
TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@wonderwarsgame
Website: https://wonderwars.game
Discord: https://discord.gg/zyVDgv8aS6
